overview: Through the portrait of Charlie, a young male striptease artist who now lives in Reykjavik, we discover another face of Iceland. Living in fashionable Reykjavik in a world of prostitution, bodybuilding, fashion and finance, Charlie is a happy man. The director follows him as far as the Westmann islands and their little fishing villages, famous since the violent volcanic eruption of 1973. This time itâ€™s Charlie who will make the islanders tremble by giving a performance in a bar.
title: Bad Boy Charlie
